title.en: Nee, Boku ga Inai to Shinutte Itte yo

altTitles.ja: ねえ、僕がいないと死ぬって言ってよ

altTitles.ja-ro: Nee, Boku ga Inai to Shinutte Itte yo

altTitles.en: Hey, tell me you will die without me

altTitles.zh-hk: 吶，說說看要是沒有我會死嘛

description.en:
"Will this love lead to happiness or despair?"
Toruka is in a relationship with Iori, an ideal high-spec boyfriend who is the envy of everyone, and she is enjoying smooth sailing in both her private and public life.
One year into their relationship, she receives a marriage proposal from Iori, who asks her to stay by his side for the rest of their lives.
She is elated, but then she discovers that someone is stalking her.
She enlists the help of her childhood friend Jin to find the culprit, but ......?
24-hour surveillance, eavesdropping, tailing...the yandere boy's warped love and obsession run amok never ceases in this dicey romance...!
description.ja:
この愛のいきつく先は幸せか、それとも絶望かーー？
誰もが羨む理想のハイスぺ彼氏・伊織と交際し、公私ともに順風満帆な日々を送る透花。
交際スタートから1年、伊織から「一生側にいてほしい」と結婚の申し出を受ける。
喜びに浮かれる透花だったが、そんな時、誰かにストーキングされていることが発覚。
幼馴染の陣に協力してもらい犯人探しをするが……!?
24時間監視・盗聴・尾行…ヤンデレ男子の歪んだ愛と執着心の暴走が止まらないサイコロマンスが幕を開けるーー！

---
這段愛情的盡頭是幸福，抑或是絕望呢――？
與人人稱羨的理想極品男友·伊織交往，於公於私都過著順風順水的日子的透花。
開始交往後的１年，由伊織提出了「希望你能一輩子陪伴在右」的求婚。
沈浸在喜悅之中的透花，就在此時，發現似乎被誰給跟蹤著。
並在青梅竹馬的陣的幫助之下找尋犯人……！？
24小時監視·監聽·跟蹤…無法制止病嬌男子扭曲的愛與暴走的執著心之精神病羅曼史就此展開序幕――！
description.zh-hk:
這段愛情的盡頭是幸福，抑或是絕望呢――？
與人人稱羨的理想極品男友·伊織交往，於公於私都過著順風順水的日子的透花。
開始交往後的１年，由伊織提出了「希望你能一輩子陪伴在右」的求婚。
沈浸在喜悅之中的透花，就在此時，發現似乎被誰給跟蹤著。
並在青梅竹馬的陣的幫助之下找尋犯人……！？
24小時監視·監聽·跟蹤…無法制止病嬌男子扭曲的愛與暴走的執著心之精神病羅曼史就此展開序幕――！

title.en: The Story Between a Dumb Prefect and a High School Girl with an Inappropriate Skirt Length

altTitles.ja-ro: Ponkotsu Fuukiiin to Skaato take ga Futekisetsu na JK no Hanashi

altTitles.id: Kisah Antara Komite Lugu dan Gadis SMA dengan Rok yang Terlalu Pendek

altTitles.en: Story of the Useless Prefect and the High School Girl with an Inappropriate Skirt Length

altTitles.ja: ポンコツ風紀委員とスカート丈が不適切なJKの話

altTitles.zh: 根筋的風紀委員與裙長不當的JK

altTitles.pt-br: A História Entre um Monitor Burro e uma Colegial com a Saia em um Cumprimento Inadequado

description.en:
Sakuradaimon is the school's prefect. A prefect is a student who is authorized to enforce discipline. As a prefect, he's supposed to be a role model to other students, but unfortunately he's not perfect. Kohinata is one of the people who Sakuradaimon has tried to discipline into wearing appropriate school attire, but she has thus far been disobedient.

And so this is a story of the two interacting with one another.
description.pt-br: Sakuradaimon é o monitor do colégio; um monitor é um aluno que é pode aplicar atos disciplinatórios. Como monitor ele deve ser um aluno modelo para os outros estudantes, mas infelizmente ele não é perfeito. Kohinata é uma das estudantes que o Sakuradaimon tenta disciplinar devido ao uso incorreto do uniforme escolar, mas até o presente momento ela foi desobediente. Esta é a história entre a interação entre os dois.

title.en: How the Little Brother Who Turned Into a Girl Became His Big Brother's Girlfriend

altTitles.ja: 兄貴の彼女になる、女の子になっちゃった弟。

altTitles.ja-ro: Aniki No Kanojo Ni Naru, Onnanoko Ni Nacchatta Otouto

altTitles.en: When I Returned Home for the First Time in a Long Time, My Brother Transformed Into a Girl

altTitles.ja: 久しぶりに実家に帰ったら弟がTSしてた。

altTitles.ja-ro: Hisashiburi Ni Jikka Ni Kaettara Otouto Ga TS Shiteta

description.en:
When I returned home for the first time in a long time, my little brother transformed into a girl!?

---

[Fantia 18+ Content](https://mangadex.org/title/7a23de9c-01b8-43bd-ac38-0bfe0bebcc3b)
description.id: Ketika aku pulang ke rumah setelah sekian lamanya adik tiri laki-laki ku berubah menjadi gadis!?

altTitles.en: Demon Devourer

description.en:
The descendant of a once great wizarding family, Elric Mervinger is unable to perform magic due to a rare medical condition.

While attempting to cure his disease, he stumbles upon the demon Mephistopheles, who tries to possess Elric to free himself from a dragon’s trap. But when Elric ends up absorbing Mephisto instead, the two become bound together.

With Mephisto by his side, will this new power allow Elric to restore his family to its former glory? Or will he just end up being devoured?

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)
description.fr:
Elric Melvinger.
L’unique héritier de la prestigieuse famille magique.
Bien qu’il possédait un talent inné, il avait trop de talent, et de ce fait, ne pouvait pas apprendre la magie. Cependant, il a alors reçu une bénédiction laissée par ses ancêtres !

[Manger des démons.]
[Avaler des démons.]
[Boire des démons.]
[Continue d’accumuler des démons en toi, et réalise une nouvelle magie !]

Élève-toi.
Va si haut que personne ne pourra jamais t’atteindre.
description.ko:
"어이, 메피. 여기 언령마법 풀이 좀 써주시죠?"

기묘한 기연으로 한 몸 살이를 하게 된
천재 마법사 엘릭과 원죄의 마왕 메피스토펠레스.

마법 불능 엘릭이 가보 '마도 경식'의 힘을 빌어
메피스토의 흑마법을 뒤집고 그 힘을 흡수해버린
명실상부 갑을 관계!

하지만,
엘릭은 메피스토의 힘을 최대한 흡수해 강해지려 하고
메피스토는 자신의 기운을 최대한 불어넣어 지배하려 하고...
실상은 서로가 갑이자 을일 수밖에 없는 운명.
마도 명문 메르빙거 가의 재건을 꿈꾸는 엘릭과
엘릭의 몸을 지배해 다시금 고귀한 마왕으로 부활하려는 메피스토의
'동상이몽 마족삼킴 어드벤쳐'

"좋게 좋게 가시죠?"
"하찮은 인간 따위에게... 굴복할 것 같으냐!!!"

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)

title.en: Goddess of Victory: Nikke - Sweet Encount

altTitles.ja: 勝利の女神：NIKKE すいーとえんかうんと

altTitles.ja-ro: Shouri no Megami: Nikke - Sweet Encounter

altTitles.en: Goddess of Victory: Nikke - Sweet Encounter

altTitles.ja-ro: Shouri no Megami: Nikke - Sweet Encount

description.en:
In this manga, NIKKE and their friends live peacefully. A loose comedy in which the main character N102 works as a maid at a maid café called "Maid For You", where Cocoa and Soda work too!

The first official manga based on the popular mobile game *Goddess of Victory: NIKKE* with over 25 million downloads worldwide!
description.ja: 全世界累計2500万DL突破の大人気アプリゲーム『NIKKE』の公式初まんが。このまんがの世界では、NIKKEたちは平和に過ごす――。主人公Nがココアやソーダがいるメイド喫茶「メイド・フォー・ユー」でメイドとして働くゆるふわコメディ♪

altTitles.ja-ro: Sei Hantai na Danjo to Inu no Deai
Seihantai na Watashitachi
Seihantai na Watashi-tachi

altTitles.en: Encounter Between Polar Opposites and Their Dogs
We are Opposites

description.en:
A man and a woman with opposite personalities and two dogs meet while out for a walk.

 Fluffy small dog x chattering boyfriend,
 Scary big dog x Powerful girlfriend...
 There is no doubt that you will be warmed by the gap moe that fills the screen!!

altTitles.en: Friends Games

description.en:
Katagiri Yuichi believes that friends are more important than money, but he also knows the hardships of not having enough funds. He works hard to save up in order to go on the high school trip, because he has promised his four best friends that they will all go together. However, after the class's money is all collected, it is stolen! Suspicion falls on two of Yuichi's friends, Sawaragi Shiho and Shibe Makoto.  
  
Soon afterward, the five of them are kidnapped, and wake up in a strange room with a character from a short-lived anime. Apparently, one of them has entered them into a "friendship game" in order to take care of their massive debt. But who was it, and why did they have such a debt? Could they have stolen the money from class to pay for entry into the game? Katagiri and his best friends will have to succeed in psychological games that will test or destroy their faith in one another.
description.pl:
Dziękujemy za wpłatę dwudziestu milionów jenów! W ten sposób dołączyliście do jedynej w swoim rodzaju gry przyjaciół! Witajcie, jestem Manabu. Pozwólcie, że wyjaśnię wam zasady. Weźmiecie udział w bardzo prostych grach, dzięki którym będziecie mogli zdobyć pieniądze. W ten sposób w mgnieniu oka pozbędziecie się swojego długu! Oczywiście możecie się wycofać, ale nie zwrócimy wam wpłaconej kwoty, a wasz dług pozostanie niezmieniony. Jest pewien sposób, aby każdy szczęśliwie ukończył grę. Wystarczy nie wątpić w przyjaciół. Proste, czyż nie?  
  
Ale czy da się nie wątpić w przyjaciół, jeśli pośród nich znajduje się zdrajca?  
Czy da się przełożyć przyjaciół nad pieniądze?  
Oczywiście, że nie.  
A więc popatrzmy na tych młodych ludzi, którzy nawzajem będą się oszukiwać!
description.pt-br: "A amizade é mais importante do que o dinheiro?" Yuuichi e seus amigos são sequestrados e acordam no meio de uma sala com um estranho personagem que os obriga a participar de uma estranha competição onde dinheiro e intriga colocarão seus laços à prova.

title.en: Astral Online - Maou no Noroi de Saikyou Bishoujo ni natta Ore, Saijaku Shoku da ga Cheat Skill de Chou Seichou shite Musou suru

altTitles.ja: アストラル・オンライン 魔王の呪いで最強美少女になったオレ、最弱職だがチートスキルで超成長して無双する

altTitles.en: Astral Online: I, Who Became the Strongest Beautiful Girl Due to the Demon King's Curse, Have the Weakest Job but I Grow Up Super Fast With My Cheat Skills and Become a Warrior.

description.en:
A high school boy, Sora Kamijo, who is addicted to VR games, starts playing Astral Online, a VRMMO that has been talked about as a god game, and suddenly finds himself fighting against the Demon King, the last boss. In addition to the sudden battle, the Demon King casts a curse on him and transforms him into a beautiful silver-haired girl...?　

A new VRMMO fantasy involving both the game and reality begins!

altTitles.en: The Genius Witch Lost MP.

altTitles.pt-br: A Bruxa gênia perdeu seu MP

altTitles.vi: Nàng Phù Thủy Thiên Tài Hết Mana Rồi!

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

title.en: Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de

altTitles.ja: 痣だらけのクラスメイトが心配で

altTitles.en: I'm Worried About My Classmate Who's Covered in Bruises
I'm Worried About My Classmate That's Covered in Bruises

altTitles.pt-br: Estou preocupado com minha colega de classe coberta de hematomas

altTitles.ro: Sunt îngrijorat Pentru o Colegă Acoperită de Vânătăi

altTitles.ru: Я беспокоюсь о своей однокласснице покрытой синяками

altTitles.tr: Her Tarafı Bandaj Kaplı Olan Sınıf Arkadaşım Hakkında Endişeleniyorum

altTitles.vi: Tôi lo lắng cho người bạn cùng lớp đầy những vết bầm tím

description.en: A story from the perspective of a concerned protagonist and a female classmate who's suspiciously covered in bruises.

altTitles.en: Yoi With Mottled Skin

description.en:
Yoi, a girl who has nowhere to go because she looks different from the people around her.
Who reached out to her...?

This is a sci-fi story about an atypical girl who puts her existence on the line to survive in a world of despair!

altTitles.en: Strawberry Marshmallow

altTitles.ja-ro: Ichigo Marshmallow

description.en: "Cute girls doing cute things in cute ways." Everyday things make up the fabric of life, whether it's making friends, going to school, trying to make money, or celebrating a holiday. Ichigo Mashimaro follows the antics and daily lives of Chika Itoh, her sister Nobue, and her friends Miu, Matsuri, and Ana.

title.en: My Sect's Senior Disciple Has a Hole in His Brain

altTitles.en: There's a Pit in My Senior's Brain
There's Something Wrong with My Da Shixiong's Brain

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Jia Da Shi Xiong Nao Zi You Keng

description.en:
The hilarious adventures of the eldest disciple of a sect who has a problem with his brain. Dong Fang Xian Yun was reincarnated as the most senior disciple of the Carefree sect. But the only thing that goes through his mind is to make sure he doesn't end up dying by the hands of the "main character". Read as he makes no sense to his fellow disciples while avoiding flags left and right.  
  
*Note : Although there are many chapters listed as missing, nothing is actually missing, some of chapter combining into one.*

altTitles.en: Dead Rock

altTitles.ja-ro: Deddo Rokku

description.en:
The latest series by Hiro Mashima is a Demon World Academy Dark Fantasy!!
DEAD ROCK is a demon king training institution that towers over the depths of the demon world.
Yakuto, a young demon, challenges the harsh entrance exam to knock on the doors of DEAD ROCK!!
description.fr: DEAD ROCK se déroule au sein de l'académie sombre et fantastique du même nom, un institut d'entraînement pour les rois démons qui gouvernent les abysses du monde des démons. C'est là que Yakuto, un jeune résident du monde des démons, se lance dans le défi des examens d'admission.
description.ja:
デッドロック、それは魔界の深層にそびえたつ魔王養成機関。
魔界人の若者であるヤクトは、デッドロックの門戸をたたくため、過酷な入学試験に挑む!!

description.en: Haruka is a writer who is overwhelmed by deadlines and takes time out of her busy schedule to reset her mind. Strolling around the neighborhood, soaking in the public bath, eating the local cuisine, enjoying the park... even though she can’t take a big vacation or travel far, she’s determined to still enjoy any little “vacation” she can by getting creative!
description.ja: 締め切りに追われる作家のはるかが、忙しい毎日の合間を縫ってわずかな時間で気持ちをリセット。ご近所散策、銭湯、近場グルメ、公園満喫…まとまった休みが取れなくても、遠くへ旅行に行けなくても、少しの発想の切り替えで、ワクワクできる「休み」は満喫できる! 休みが足りないすべての人に、はるかがステキな休日を贈ります!

altTitles.ja-ro: Rosengarten Saga

altTitles.ja: ローゼンガーテン・サーガ

description.en: Lynn's village getting attacked by bandits doesn't keep her down in the dumps for long! Picking up a sword housing an extraordinary pervert… I mean hero, Siegfried, she sets off on a journey of many bouts with various degenerat… ahem, heroes!

title.en: Kono Sekai no Kouryakuhon wo Hirotte Shimaimashita

altTitles.ja: この世界の攻略本を拾ってしまいました

altTitles.ja-ro: Kono Sekai no Kouryokubon wo Hirotteshimaimashita

altTitles.en: I Picked Up This World's Strategy Guide!
I ran into a strategy guide to this world.
I Happened To Pick Up A Strategy Guide To This World

description.en:
Sana, the daughter of an item shop in a corner of the castle town, went out to the forest to pick medicinal herbs as usual in order to make recovery potions for the store's products. There, Sana picks up her mysterious book.
Because she read the strategy book, the daughter of the item shop, who shouldn't have anything to do with the story, is greatly involved in the story of the game!
Another world romantic comedy adventure fantasy!
description.ja:
城下町の片隅にある道具屋の娘・サナは、店の商品の回復ビンを作るため、いつものように森に薬草を摘みに出かけていた。
そこでサナは謎の本を拾う──。
攻略本を読んでしまったことで関係ないはずの道具屋の娘が、ゲームのストーリーに大きく関わってしまうことに…!?
異世界ラブコメ冒険ファンタジー！

altTitles.ja: 魔王さまエクスチェンジ!!

altTitles.ja-ro: Maou-sama Exchange!!

description.en: Hero Filina’s party is on the brink of annihilation in the face of a powerful Demon Lord. The almighty demon proposes to spare their lives on one condition - that he may swap bodies with the hero for a year. Atty, a Priest and Filina’s childhood friend, naturally objects to the proposal, but Filina agrees to the terms to protect her companions. Thus begins a new journey for the Demon Lord, naive to the ways of the world, and the quirky group of adventurers, as they set out to vanquish the new Demon Lord once and for all...!!

altTitles.en: Bocchi the Rock!

description.en: Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. However, her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a girl who plays drums and is looking for a new guitarist for her band.
description.es: Bocchi The Rock! cuenta la historia de Goto Hitori, una chica de secundaria que empieza a aprender a tocar la guitarra persiguiendo su sueño de formar parte de una banda. Pese a que es muy dedicada, su arrolladora timidez le impide poder conseguir siquiera una amiga. Pero cuando conozca a Ijichi Nijika, una baterista que está buscando una nueva guitarrista para su grupo, Goto dará el primer paso para cumplir su gran sueño página a página, tira a tira.
description.it: Hitori Goto è una liceale che inizia a imparare a suonare la chitarra in quanto il suo sogno è di entrare a far parte di una band, ma è talmente timida da non avere nemmeno un amico. Ma il suo sogno potrebbe avverarsi in seguito all'incontro con Nijika Ijichi, una ragazza che suona la batteria ed è alla ricerca proprio di un chitarrista per la band in cui suona.
description.ja:
「ぼっちちゃん」こと後藤ひとりは、ギターを愛する孤独な少女。
家で一人寂しく弾くだけの毎日でしたが、ひょんなことから伊地知虹夏が率いる「結束バンド」に加入することに。
人前での演奏に不慣れな後藤は、立派なバンドマンになれるのか――！？
全国のぼっちな少年少女に届ける、いま最高にアツい音楽漫画！！
陰キャならロックをやれ！！！
description.pt-br:
Hitori Gotou é uma colegial que está começando a aprender a tocar violão porque sonha em fazer parte de uma banda, mas é tão tímida que não fez um único amigo. No entanto, seu sonho pode se tornar realidade depois que ela conhece Nijika Ijichi, uma garota que toca bateria e está procurando um novo guitarrista para sua banda.

[ 1° TEMP.  DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 2, Cap 21. ]

altTitles.en: Boy Friends and Girl Friends

altTitles.ja-ro: Otoko Tomodachi to Onna Tomodachi

title.en: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

altTitles.ja-ro: Amagami-san Chi no Enmusubi

altTitles.fr: Se marier avec une sœur Amagami
Comment j'ai marié une sœur Amagami

description.en: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine. A tale of love and miracles is about to unfold!
description.fr: Kamihate Uryuu, orphelin depuis l'enfance, reçoit une invitation à séjourner dans le sanctuaire shinto local. Tout ce qu'il voulait, c'était un endroit tranquille pour étudier afin de réaliser son rêve d'entrer dans une grande école de médecine, mais en arrivant sur place, il tombe sur trois belles demoiselles du sanctuaire... Le prêtre en chef lui demande d'épouser l'une d'entre elles et de prendre la succession du sanctuaire. Une histoire d'amour et de miracles est sur le point de se dérouler !
description.ja: 京大医学部を目指す高校生の上終 瓜生。児童養護施設育ちの瓜生は「甘神神社」の宮司さんに引き取られ、居候することに。受験勉強ができる環境があれば…と思っていたが、居候の条件は「婿養子として神社を継ぐ」こと!? しかも結婚相手は同居する巫女三姉妹!! 一つ屋根の下、巫女と紡ぐ恋と奇跡の物語、開幕!!
description.ru: Камихатэ Урю долгое время прожил в приюте, пока не был взят под опеку священником Тидори Амагами. Остановившись в храме, Урю узнаёт, что здесь живут три жрицы-сёстры, которые являются внучками главного священника. В конечном итоге, Тидори Амагами рассказывает, что взял парня под опеку, чтобы он женился на одной из его внучек и унаследовал храм, как его зять. Так начинается история любви и чудес с семьёй Амагами.

altTitles.en: Aishuu Lover

description.en: In a world where people suddenly developed super-powers, those who used their abilities to do evil are held at Catastrophe Prison. Shu Ono, a guard at the prison, somehow fell in love with the strongest female prisoner Lava! A crazy love-comedy about the forbidden relationship between guard and prisoner!
description.es-la: Un mundo en el que las personas desarrollan repentinamente habilidades diferentes. Los que utilizan sus habilidades para hacer el mal son encarcelados en una prisión de catastrófica. Shu Ono, que trabaja allí como guardia, se enamora de algún modo de la prisionera más fuerte, ¡Lava!

altTitles.en: A Monster Wants to Eat Me

altTitles.ja: 私を喰べたい、ひとでなし

altTitles.en: This Monster Wants to Eat Me

description.en: High school girl Hinako is living a quiet life in a seaside town, but she feels somewhat detached from her friends during the summer months when she is reminded of when her family died years ago. One day, she meets Shiori, a mysterious girl who reminds her of the ocean, especially when it comes to her translucent blue eyes, but Shiori soon reveals that she is actually a mermaid who has been looking for Hinako for a long time.
description.ru: Старшеклассница Хинако живет обычной жизнью в городке на морском побережье. Однажды она встречает Шиори, загадочную девушку с глазами цвета океана, но вскоре оказывается, что Шиори — на самом деле русалка, которая наблюдала за Хинако уже долгое время.

title.en: Dragon Quest: The Great Adventure of Dai - Avan the Brave and the Demon King of Hellfire

altTitles.ja: ドラゴンクエスト ダイの大冒険 勇者アバンと獄炎の魔王

altTitles.ja-ro: Dragon Quest: Dai no Daibouken - Yuusha Avan to Gokuen no Maou

description.en: The Demon King's army led by Hadler is attacking the world. The Kingdom of Carl and Princess Flora stand up to stop the invasion. And then there's young Avan! Another heroic story begins now!

altTitles.ko: 风停之迹 / 바람이 머무는 자리

description.pl: Aby złamać starożytną klątwę, która nęka królewską linię krwi, młody książę Tasara ma zostać złożony w ofierze śmierci. Nara zostaje zatrudniony jako pałacowy sługa, który ma wykonać egzekucję księcia, gdy nadejdzie czas. Po popełnieniu okrutnego i niewybaczalnego czynu wobec Tasary, Nara jest zdesperowany, by naprawić swoje krzywdy. Wkrótce ich lubieżny związek, który do tej pory był trzymany w tajemnicy, wystawia na próbę jego determinację. Czy Nara da się odwieść od swojej pierwotnej misji? Nie wiadomo, jak daleko się posunie, by zyskać przebaczenie Tasary.

title.en: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED Destiny - The Edge

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Gundam SEED Destiny - The Edge

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダムSEED DESTINY THE EDGE

description.en: Retelling of Mobile Suit Gundam SEED Destiny's story from Athrun Zala's point of view.

title.en: Ars Goetia ～The Boy Who Was Called Incompetent Uses 72 Demons to Become Unstoppable

altTitles.ja: アルス・ゲーティア ~無能と呼ばれた少年は、72の悪魔を使役して無双する~

altTitles.en: Ars Goetia～The Son Called Incompetent Commands 72 Demons to Unleash Unrivaled Power

description.en:
“I have decided not to expect anything from you anymore.”

One day, Norman is told this by his father and is kicked out of the house.

There was no way around it. Because Norman could not use magic at all.

However, Norman’s fate changes drastically when he encounters the Grimoire “Ars Goetia”.

The Grimoire called “Ars Goetia” was used to summon 72 demons.

The demons summoned by it, however, bring about a shocking revelation to Norman. Yes, there was a reason why Norman could not use magic.

And so, Norman becomes the strongest sorcerer in the world by subduing numerous demons

altTitles.ja: レモンソーダフレーバーキス

description.en: "A kiss from my best friend!?" Rio and Leo have been childhood friends since kindergarten. However, as they start their last year of high school, they're in separate classes for the first time. It's during this first day of the new school year that Leo suddenly confesses to Rio and kisses him.... What's going on!?

title.en: Honzuki no Gekokujou - Macha's Twitter Collection

altTitles.en: Ascendance of a Bookworm - Macha's Twitter Collection

altTitles.ru: Власть книжного червя - Коллекция macha в Твиттере

title.en: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon: Elma OL Nikki

altTitles.en: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid: Elma's Office Lady Diary

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン エルマのＯＬ日記

altTitles.zh-hk: 小林家的龍女僕 艾瑪的OL日記

altTitles.zh: 小林家的龙女仆 艾玛的OL日记

altTitles.it: La cameriera drago di Kobayashi: il diario da office lady di Elma

altTitles.vi: Nhật ký gái công sở của Elma

altTitles.uk: Драконопокоївка пані Кобаяші: Офісні дні Ельми

altTitles.vi: Hầu Gái Rồng Nhà Kobayashi: Nhật Ký Công Sở Của Elma

description.en: A spin-off of [Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon](https://mangadex.org/manga/15514) focusing on the daily life of Elma.
description.id: Sebuah spinoff dari [Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon](https://mangadex.org/manga/15514) yang berfokus pada keseharian Elma.
description.ru: Спин-офф основной серии, фокусирующийся на повседневной жизни одной из драконов, Эльмы.

title.en: Jojoni Deremi ga Mashiteku Tsundere Gyaru

altTitles.ja: 徐々にデレ味が増してくツンデレギャル

altTitles.vi: Cô nàng gal tsundere ngày càng đáng yêu hơn

altTitles.ja-ro: Jojoni Deremi ga Mashiteku Tsundere Gal
Jojoni Deremi ga Mashiteku Tsundere Gyaru

altTitles.tr: Tsundere Gal Günden Güne Daha Sevimli Hale Geliyor

altTitles.en: The Tsundere Gal Whose Dere Side Gradually Increases

title.en: Private Life is Theirs Alone. Celebrity x Yuri Anthology

altTitles.ja: プライベートは本人たちに任せております。芸能人×百合アンソロジー

altTitles.ja-ro: Private wa Honnin-tachi ni Makasete Orimasu. Geinoujin x Yuri Anthology

altTitles.en: Private Life is Left to Them. Talent x Yuri Anthology
The Blue Star on That Day

description.en: Koumoto Umi, a normal high school girl, falls in love with the pretty girl from the class next door, Segawa Shou. Even though she feels overwhelmed by her feelings, she can’t help but want to get closer to the mysterious Shou.
description.pt-br: Koumoto Umi, uma garota normal do ensino médio, se apaixona pela garota bonita da sala ao lado, Segawa Shou. Mesmo que ela se sinta sobrecarregada com esses sentimentos, ela não consegue evitar de se aproximar da misteriosa Shou.

altTitles.ja: 踊り場にスカートが鳴る

altTitles.en: The Skirt Sings at the Landing
The Skirt Rings at the Landing

description.en:
Haruma Kiki always dreamed of doing ballroom dance as the feminine "follower" role, but as she aged she only grew taller and taller, eventually causing her to give up ever looking good in a dress or anything ladylike. Now, as a second year in high school, she specializes in the masculine "leader" role—until one day, her partner suddenly leaves her. When Toribami Michiru, a short and pretty first year, shows up wanting to join the ballroom dance club, Kiki asks her to be her new partner, but Michiru reveals that she only plays the leader role—and she wants none other than Kiki as her partner.  
  
Bimonthly serialisation in Yuri Hime.
description.es-la: Haruma Kiki siempre soñó con hacer bailes de salón como el papel de "seguidora" femenina, pero a medida que pasaban los años solo crecía más y más alta, lo que finalmente hizo que renunciara a verse bien con un vestido o cualquier cosa de dama. Ahora, en su segundo año de secundaria, se especializa en el papel de "líder" masculina, hasta que un día, su pareja la abandona de repente. Cuando Toribami Michiru, una pequeña y linda chica de primer año, aparece queriendo unirse al club de baile de salón, Kiki le pide que sea su nueva compañera, pero Michiru revela que ella solo juega el papel de líder, y ella no quiere nada menos que a Kiki como su compañera.

altTitles.en: شرور معکوس

description.en:
Jung-woo is stuck in a reincarnation cycle along with his nemesis, Shin-Ryong. Ever since he was little, he had a dream.  

He wanted to become strong enough to conquer Murim.  
  
However, things did not always go the way he planned. Shin-Ryong defeated him on every occasion. At this point, Ha Jung-woo had been reincarnated 5 times and was defeated yet again.  
  
When he is reincarnated for the sixth time, he is born into the modern world.  
Being born into a new world changes Jung-woo's goal, as Murim is gone.  

Yet he continues training in order to defeat Shin-Ryong.  
  
Ultimately, he prioritizes the goal of becoming stronger to defeat Shin-Ryong, while trying to adapt to this modern world where he has a family and goes to a school like a normal person.
description.it:
Jung-woo è bloccato in un ciclo di reincarnazione insieme alla sua nemesi, Shin-Ryong. E ha da sempre un sogno.  
Diventare abbastanza forte da conquistare Murim.  
  
Tuttavia, le cose non sono sempre andate come previsto. Shin-Ryong lo ha sconfitto in ogni occasione.  
A questo punto, Ha Jung-woo si era reincarnato 5 volte ed è stato sconfitto ancora una volta.  
  
Quando si reincarna per la sesta volta, nasce nel mondo moderno.  
Essere nati in un nuovo mondo cambia l'obiettivo di Jung-woo, poiché il Murim non c'è più.  
Eppure continua ad allenarsi per sconfiggere Shin-Ryong.  
  
Alla fine, ha l'obiettivo di diventare più forte per sconfiggere Shin-Ryong, mentre cerca di adattarsi a questo mondo moderno dove ha una famiglia e va in una scuola come una persona "normale".
description.ru:
Чжун Ву не впервой перерождаться. В прошлом он уже не единожды пытался завоевать Мурим, но из-за Шин Рюна, перерождающегося всё это время вместе с ним, ему так ни разу это и не удалось. В конце концов, после очередной, пятой по счёту, неудачной попытки он перерождается в наше время, и это кардинально меняет взгляды Чжун Ву на мир, заставляя пересмотреть свои стремления и мечты. Он жаждет битв с могущественными врагами, но для большинства он слишком силён.  
Это история о взаимоотношениях, продолжающихся на протяжении нескольких жизней, и о том, как герою удаётся вырваться из порочного круга и найти новый путь.  
  


---

**Links**:  
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/49294)

title.en: Tsuihousareru Tabi ni Skill wo Te ni Ireta Ore ga, 100 no Isekai de 2-shuume Musou

altTitles.ja: 追放されるたびにスキルを手に入れた俺が、100の異世界で2周目無双

altTitles.en: I Got a New Skill Every Time I Was Exiled, and After 100 Different Worlds, I Was Unmatched
Unmatched in 100 Different Worlds — I Gain a New Skill Every Time I Get Banished

description.en:
An adventurer named Ed was exiled from his party because he was considered useless, but instead of being sad and upset he was actually happy!!?

It turns out that it's not without reason that he feels happy when he's exiled from his party, because every time he's been exiled he will receive a skill that makes him even more invincible...
- - -
Ed was given the crazy test of having to get expelled from 100 Hero parties in 100 different worlds before he could return to his original world. Finally a mysterious and divine entity said that he had achieved all the conditions to return to his original world.

However, as a final condition he is asked “Look at the fate of one of these exile worlds after you left.” and he is shocked by what he sees.

“Okay, I’ll do it! I’ll go down to these 100 worlds again and be banished with a good feeling!” Ed takes on a new challenge to make full use of the super-powerful “Exiled Skills” that were granted each time he was exiled, and this time ensure they all have happy endings.

Only this time he is accompanied to these 100 worlds by a former companion…
description.id:
Seorang petualang bernama ed di keluarkan dari party nya karena di anggap tidak berguna, namun daripada sedih dan kesal dia malah bahagia!!?.

Ternyata bukan tanpa alasan dia merasa baagia ketika di keluarkan dari party nya di karenakan setiap kali dia di keluarkan dia akan menerima sebuah skill yang membuatnya jadi semakin tidak terkalahkan...

altTitles.en: Player Breakout

altTitles.th: ยอดคนเลเวลทะลุ

description.en:
Dungeons and monsters suddenly appear and the world falls into chaos. Kim Ki-Bong, an ordinary young part-timer, has been sucked up into an awakening dimension for 3000 years to train his powers.

When he makes his return to reality, he is a max-leveled player who only has one wish - to reconcile with his loved ones. 10 years have passed in the real world during his absence.

How will Ki-Bong be able to find his place in the world with his new limit-breaking abilities?

---

description.fr:
Kibong était coincé dans le « test de l’éveil » pendant 3000 ans à cause d’un bug. Enfin libéré du test, le joueur découvre que seulement 10 ans se sont écoulés dans la réalité, et que le monde est devenu un enfer total envahi par les monstres. Avec toutes ses capacités au niveau max, Kibong parviendra-t-il à sauver l’humanité de ces affreuses créatures ?

---

Terjebak dalam ruang simulasi selama 3.000 tahun karena error yang tidak diketahui. Tapi di dunia nyata, hanya 10 tahun sudah berlalu dan kini monster beserta dungeon muncul di dunia ini. Pertarungan Kibong yang kembali dengan MAX LEVEL dimulai untuk mengembalikan semuanya!

알 수 없는 오류로 3000년간 각성 테스트에 갇힌 김기봉.
그 사이 현실에선 10년이 흘렀고, 온 세상은 몬스터와 던전으로 가득차게 되었다.
만렙으로 귀환한 김기봉의 모든 것을 원래대로 돌려놓기 위한 싸움이 시작된다!

description.ru:
Ким Ки Бон, молодой парень, оказался в ловушке из-за неизвестных ему обстоятельств. И только через три тысячи лет, он смог "пробудиться". Но в реальности прошло лишь 10 лет, и за это время, весь мир был наводнён разными и ужасными монстрами..
И с этого момента, пробудившийся Ким Ки Бон вступает в битву, чтобы найти ответы на все свои вопросы.

ในระหว่างที่คิมกิบงถูกขังใน "พื้นที่สำหรับปลุกพลัง" เป็นเวลา 3,000 ปีเนื่องจากเกิดข้อผิดพลาดที่ไม่รู้สาเหตุ เวลาในโลกจริงก็ผ่านไปแล้ว 10 ปี เมื่อคิมกิบงออกมาได้โลกก็กลายเป็นนรกที่มีมอนสเตอร์และดันเจี้ยนเต็มไปหมด การต่อสู้ของคิมกิบงเพื่อฟื้นฟูให้โลกกลับสู่สภาพเดิมเริ่มต้นแล้ว!

description.zh:
菜鸟三千年升级变最强王者！
怪物肆虐的世界由我来拯救！
林纪锋因游戏Bug被困在觉醒空间3000年，并且被怪兽杀死后还可以无限复活！被迫成为游戏玩家的他，为了重新开始自己的生活，必须与怪兽战斗！但他在觉醒空间的这段时间，地球已过去了10年，整个世界都充满了怪兽...

---

《CHANGE》作家的新作！金起峰因不明異常被困在覺醒試煉裡3000年，在那期間現實已經過了10年，化為怪物肆虐的末日世界。 滿等重生的金起峰，為了讓一切回歸正常而戰。

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/beyonod-max-level/list?title_no=2547)

altTitles.en: The Lone Spellcaster
I Alone Cast Spells

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore Dake ga Jumon Tsukai

description.en:
The world is under threat from interdimensional monsters, and only the chosen Awakened - humans possessed of special powers - can defeat them!

Sure, it sounds exciting, but it’s a far cry from reality for ordinary office worker Park Dohyeok, who’s more worried about landing a big business deal that could save his job. That is, until one day when Dohyeok’s path crosses a monster outbreak, causing him to manifest his true powers as a rare and powerful form of Awakened!

With his newfound abilities attracting eager allies and powerful enemies, will Dohyeok find that he has what it takes to survive?
description.it: Il mondo è minacciato da mostri interdimensionali e solo i prescelti "Risvegliati" - esseri umani dotati di poteri speciali - possono sconfiggerli! Certo, sembra eccitante, ma è molto lontano dalla realtà per il normale impiegato Dohyeok Park, che è più preoccupato di concludere un grosso affare che potrebbe salvargli il posto di lavoro. Questo fino a quando, un giorno, la strada di Dohyeok si incrocia con un'epidemia di mostri che gli fa manifestare i suoi veri poteri come una rara e potente forma di Risvegliato. Con le sue nuove capacità che attirano alleati desiderosi e potenti nemici, Dohyeok scoprirà di avere ciò che serve per sopravvivere?
description.ja:
平凡なサラリーマンとして日々を送っていた白虎到（はくと いたる）。 絶体絶命の危機に晒された瞬間、あれほど望んでいた覚醒者に！ しかも、２０代全てをゲームに注いだあの時の記憶と経験が覚醒の能力になるとは！！！ さらに、なんと10億分の1の確率と言われている「トリプル覚醒者」に！ 世界の頂点（トップ）を目指す呪文使い「白虎到」の奇想天外の活躍ストーリーが今、始まります。

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98-%ED%99%80%EB%A1%9C-%EC%A3%BC%EB%AC%B8-%EC%82%AC%EC%9A%A9%EC%9E%90/2436)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74467)
description.ko:
평범한 샐러리맨으로 살아가는 박도혁,
절체절명의 위기에 빠진 순간 그토록 원하던 각성자가 되었다!
그것도 20대 인생을 바친 게임의 기억과 경험이 내 각성 능력이 되다니!!!

더구나, 10억분의 1인 확률이라는
“무려 트리플 각성자! "

세계 최고의 정점을 노리는
주문 사용자 박도혁의 기상천외한 활약기가 지금 바로 시작됩니다.

****************
청초작가님의 인기 웹소설 본격 웹툰화

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98-%ED%99%80%EB%A1%9C-%EC%A3%BC%EB%AC%B8-%EC%82%AC%EC%9A%A9%EC%9E%90/2436)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74467)
description.ru:
"Было бы здорово, если бы я смог использовать все эти способности в жизни!"
Я думал, что исполнить это желание не под силу даже Богу, но в момент смертельной опасности, похоже он услышал меня.
Самое время сыграть в реальность!
Да, теперь я единственный, кто использует заклинания!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98-%ED%99%80%EB%A1%9C-%EC%A3%BC%EB%AC%B8-%EC%82%AC%EC%9A%A9%EC%9E%90/2436)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74467)

altTitles.ja-ro: Yakusoku no Neverland

description.en:
At Grace Field House, life couldn't be better for the orphans! Though they have no parents, together with the other kids and a kind "Mama" who cares for them, they form one big, happy family. No child is ever overlooked, especially since they are all adopted by the age of 12. Their daily lives involve rigorous tests, but afterwards, they are allowed to play outside.   
  
There is only one rule they must obey: do not leave the orphanage. But one day, two top-scoring orphans, Emma and Norman, venture past the gate and unearth the horrifying reality behind their entire existence: they are all livestock, and their orphanage is a farm to cultivate food for a mysterious race of demons. With only a few months left to pull off an escape plan, the children must somehow change their predetermined fate.  

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **The Promised Neverland** (2019)
description.pt:
Na “Casa de Grace Field” habitam 38 crianças órfãs.
Vivem felizes com a sua cuidadora, Isabella, a quem as crianças tratam como mãe. Mas certo dia, Emma e Norman descobrem que a Casa de Grace Field é afinal uma “quinta” cujo objetivo é criar alimento para monstros.
As remessas de crianças enviadas são escolhidas pela sua inteligência e desempenho em testes, que servem para tornar os seus cérebros… mais saborosos!
Não querendo perder mais nenhum membro da sua família, Norman e Emma começam a reunir informação vital para a sua sobrevivência e planeiam a sua fuga do orfanato.
description.ru:
Эмма и её друзья вели вполне счастливую сиротскую жизнь в приюте. Да, там жёсткие правила, но зато смотритель добрый. Вот только почему детям запрещено приближаться к воротам и забору?.. Иногда не известно, стоит ли узнавать правду, которая полностью переворачивает всю твою жизнь.  
  
- Won the 63rd Shogakukan Manga Awards in 2018 in the best shounen category.
  


---

**Links:]**   
- [Demizu's Twitter](https://twitter.com/DemizuPosuka)   
- [Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=21552)  
- [Anime Season 2 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=23263)
description.pt-br: Emma, Norman e Ray são as crianças mais brilhantes do orfanato Grace Field House. E, sob os cuidados da mulher a que se referem como “mamãe”, todas as crianças tiveram uma vida confortável. Boa comida, roupas limpas e o ambiente perfeito para aprender - o que mais um órfão poderia querer? Um dia, porém, Emma e Norman descobrem a verdade sombria do mundo exterior que eles estão proibidos de ver.

altTitles.es: Ogenki Clinic, La Clínica del Amor

altTitles.ja-ro: Ogenki Kurinikku

description.en:
The plotline revolves around the quirky (and perpetually horny) Doctor Sawaru Ogenki and his beautiful nurse, the busty Ruko Tatase, who help patients through their problems, and the cure almost always involves sex. The patients suffer from bizarre sexual problems and our doctor and nurse are more than willing to cure them from their problem.

**Note:** The release from Studio Ironcat (Ex-Licenses) is **read** from **left to right**.

altTitles.en: Multi-skill Collector

description.en:
A world full of zombies. But this apocalypse... is it worth trying?! [Skills can be 'transferred' from experts.] Mental care, wooden construction, heavenly magic, animal communication, mechanical engineering, performance, etc.. There is so much to learn! The sprint of the prepared survivor, who is good at everything, begins!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/wannenglieren/list?title_no=1966)
description.ko:
좀비들로 뒤덮여버린 세상. 그런데 이 아포칼립스... 해볼만 하겠는데?!
[전문가에게서 스킬을 '전수'받을 수 있습니다.]
멘탈케어, 목조건축, 천마신공, 동물교감, 기계공학, 연주 등등.. 배울 게 너무 많아서 문제다! 뭐든 다 잘하는, 준비된 생존자의 질주가 시작된다!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/wannenglieren/list?title_no=1966)
description.ru:
Мир, полный зомби. Но этот апокалипсис... стоит ли пробовать ?!
[Навыки могут быть «переданы» от экспертов.]
Психологическая помощь, деревянное строительство, небесная магия, общение с животными, машиностроение, производительность и т.д. Есть так много всего, чему можно научиться! Начинается гонка подготовленного выжившего, который хорош во всем!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/wannenglieren/list?title_no=1966)
description.zh:
《觉醒战士》作者新作来袭
梦境变现，恐怖丧尸围城！
每晚做的噩梦竟然成真？！突如其来的丧尸危机，但是这场灾难…感觉还有希望！男主载林在慌乱之中意外获得“传授”技能,开始从各路专家们的身上获取技能。万事已备，无所不能的丧尸猎人开始踏上惊险的生存旅程！

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/wannenglieren/list?title_no=1966)

title.en: Screw the Noble Life, I’m Going Home

altTitles.en: Noble Lady or Whatever, I'm Going Home

description.en:
After confirming that I had won the lottery, I tried to quit my job! However, as soon as I opened the door, I found myself transmigrated into the body of a noble lady. I have one year to claim the prize money, so I have to return home at all costs. Please wait for me, my 1.7 million won! Mum will be there soon, but... What's wrong with this family?!

"I love you." But I'm not your daughter!

"Sister, you might get hurt so I'll hold you." Did he mean he would lift me? What is this guy, a giant brown bear?

"If you mess with our sister one more time, I'll make you disappear without a trace." He's got a pretty face, but he has a sharp tongue.

"Don't fall ill." Don't worry about me. Why are there so many of them?! I'm not a noble lady! Leave me alone, I wanna go home!

Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

description.en: Official 4-koma published with the game Link! Life! Love Live!

altTitles.en: Weak-kneed Teacher

altTitles.ja-ro: Yowayowa Sensei

description.en: It's the start of a new school year. The new homeroom teacher for Abikura-kun, a second-year high school boy, is Hiyori Hiwamura, who is known as a "Scary Teacher", rumored to curse you if she gets offended!One day after school, Abikura-kun witnessed the other side of "YowaYowa-sensei"... and he is shocked by the gap between reputation and reality! The opening of a romantic comedy that will stir up your protective instincts!!
description.ja: 新学期。2年生に進級した男子高校生・阿比倉くん達のクラス担任になったのは、機嫌を損ねれば呪われると噂の通称『こわこわ先生』こと、鶸村ひより先生だった！ そんな、『こわこわ先生』の裏の一面を、ある日の放課後、目撃してしまった阿比倉くんは……。まさかのギャップに悶絶必至！ あなたの庇護欲を掻き立てる、よわよわラブコメ開幕!!

altTitles.en: Himari's Surroundings

description.en: Aizawa Haruki, 16 years old, is in his 2nd year of high school, and likes to live efficiently. One day during summer vacation, a girl, Aizawa Himari, suddenly appears, calling him 'Onii-chan' and claiming that she's his little sister. As it turns out, Haruki's father recently remarried, and his new wife brought a daughter with her. However, since both of their parents are overseas, it'll only be the two of them living under the same roof. And for some reason, Himari seems very obstinate about spending as much time with Haruki as she can.

One of Zhenhua's trilogies, this love is unforgettable, yet no one knows it. Because of a single, lasting encounter when she was younger, Luo Zhi has had a crush on Sheng Huainan for eleven years. His appearance was so radiant, and since then, Luo Zhi's diary has become a one-sided love story that belongs to her alone. Because of Sheng Huainan, Luo Zhi followed him all the way and was admitted to his university. Because of multiple encounters, Luo Zhi and Sheng Huainan finally approached each other...

altTitles.ja: みつばものがたり 呪いの少女と死の輪舞《ロンド》

altTitles.ja-ro: Mitsuba no Monogatari - Noroi no Shoujo to Shi no Rondo

altTitles.en: Mitsuba's Stories

description.en:
This world is turning for me...

While sleeping in a "deathly" boring dark world, Mitsuba woke up from a long sleep with a mysterious all-powerful feeling, the girl was destined to die, but the magic that was poured into her for 10 years brought the power of a "curse" that should not exist in this world.
Her stepmother, fearing Mitsuba's "death," takes away her aristocratic nature and enrolls her in a military academy. However, this was only the beginning of Mitsuba's use of the "curse" to pursue her own path.

The powerful "curse" that resides in a small girl causes a unique tale of otherworldly devastation!
